section.title: Latest stable release
section.para: The latest packages of TubePress can always be downloaded as zip files from http://tubepress.org/download

section.title: Subversion
section.para: TubePress uses Subversion for version control. You can use any Subversion client to check out the latest developmental build of the WordPress plugin. The source for TubePress Pro is not publicly available. But as TubePress is GPL'd, TubePress Pro users will get all of the source code with their downloads.

section.title: Command line
section.simpara: If you have command line access to your server, and have a subversion client in your path, this method is the easiest.

listitem.para: Make sure you've removed any existing installs of TubePress from this directory

section.simpara: That's it! You'll now be using the very latest build of the plugin. You can now upgrade at any time with the following commands:

section.title: FTP
section.simpara: You'll need to check out the latest build locally (i.e. to your desktop machine) and then upload it to your server using FTP.

listitem.para: Use any SVN client to browse to http://tubepress.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
Checkout the trunk directory to a local directory called tubepress
Upload the tubepress directory you just created to your WordPress installation at wp-content/plugins

section.title: Nightly Builds
section.para: You can download a nightly build of the WordPress plugin package from http://tubepress.org/nightly/tubepress_nightly.zip

section.title: TubePress Pro
section.para: You can purchase your copy of TubePress Pro by visiting http://tubepress.org/download and clicking the "Buy Now" link. After payment, please following the TubePress Pro installation instructions.
